Key Match Events: Jeffrey Vandersay takes a six-wicket haul
Charith Asalanka accounts for Mohammed Siraj
Charith Asalanka strikes again, dismisses Axar Patel
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka attain a 1-0 lead in this series
Others: India started well but the openers' departure was followed by a middle-order collapse
Axar Patel and Washington Sundar tried to bring India back into the game with a 38-run stand
India would need to look into their batting and come up with a much-improved performance in the third ODI if they are to level the series
